mapper.select: SELECT prd.*, (SELECT c_name FROM Category WHERE c_code=cate.c_code_ref) category FROM Product prd INNER JOIN (SELECT order_p_number, SUM(o_count) orderNum FROM ProductOrder GROUP BY order_p_number ORDER BY orderNum DESC LIMIT 0, 10) cond ON prd.p_number = cond.order_p_number INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM Category) cate ON cate.c_code = prd.product_c_code;
SELECT c_name, c_code, c_code_ref, c_level from Category;
mapper.insert: insert into Product (p_name, p_price, p_content, p_stock, p_view, p_made, p_usedate, p_img, p_thumbImg, product_c_code) values (#{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_content}, #{p_stock}, '0', #{p_made}, #{p_usedate}, #{p_img}, #{p_thumbImg}, #{product_c_code});
mapper.select: select p.p_number, p.p_name, p.product_c_code, c.c_code_ref, c.c_name, p_price, p_content, p_stock, p_thumbImg, p_made, p_usedate from Product p inner join Category c on p.product_c_code = c.c_code order by p_number desc;

select p.p_number, p.p_name, p.product_c_code, c.c_code_ref, c.c_name, p_price, p_content, p_stock, p_made, p_usedate from Product p inner join Category c on p.product_c_code = c.c_code where p.p_number=#{p_number}
mapper.update: update Product set p_name = #{p_name}, p_price = #{p_price}, p_content = #{p_content}, p_stock = #{p_stock}, p_made = #{p_made}, p_usedate = #{p_usedate}, product_c_code = #{product_c_code} where p_number = #{p_number};
